How it all works

Using an Empatica E4 device to generate StateSong Audio.

Online demo and process of loading the Empatica E4's csv data recorded during a session. The Gnarley component is available for download/testing here for Windows and is show here staticly just for showing the process. The StateSong mobile application is available here and is currently Android only.

1. Inputs

An exmaple of the flow for generating StateSong audio from Empatica stored data.

Empatica E4

FitBit-Sense 2

Heart-Rate

Temperature

Accelerometer

Electrodermal

Blood Volume Pulse

Inter-Beat Interval
